title: vIra varam taruvAi
sahitya:
vIra varam taruvAi vaDivEl murugA varum kAanum anjiDa


anupallavi

  pOrADu mAyap-pullarakkar oDunga sIrODulaga mndar sErndini vAzhndiDa


caraNam    tiNNuDalum tiNmanamum tiNbhujangaLum tiNmayAna sheyalum payanum tyAga dhIramum 
uNmaiyAna nanmaiyAna ulaga sEvaiyum Ongak-kali nInga jayam tAnga e m pAngar irundE
